message: Refactoring review completed. No refactoring changes applied. The implementation already follows SOLID, KISS, DRY, and YAGNI principles per the design policy. clipboard-utils.ts is a clean 25-line utility with 100% test coverage. ConversationPairCard.tsx correctly threads onCopy via Optional Props without unnecessary useCallback wrapping (SF-1). HistoryPane.tsx uses copyToClipboard as the sole clipboard entry point (MF-1/DRY). WorktreeDetailRefactored.tsx correctly propagates showToast through both desktop and mobile paths (SF-S2-2). All 46 tests pass. 0 ESLint errors. 0 TypeScript errors. Target file coverage: clipboard-utils.ts 100%, ConversationPairCard.tsx 98.5%, HistoryPane.tsx 100%.
